120B.title: Criminal Conspiracy
120B.description: Agreement between two or more persons to commit an illegal act.
120B.punishment: Punishment varies depending on offence conspired

141.title: Unlawful Assembly
141.description: An assembly of 5 or more persons with a common unlawful object.
141.punishment: Up to 6 months imprisonment or fine

147.title: Rioting
147.description: Use of force or violence by an unlawful assembly.

149.title: Offence by Unlawful Assembly
149.description: Every member of an unlawful assembly is guilty of the offence committed.

153A.title: Promoting Enmity
153A.description: Promoting enmity between groups on grounds of religion, race, etc.

268.title: Public Nuisance
268.description: An act that causes injury, danger or annoyance to the public.
268.punishment: Fine or imprisonment depending on severity

302.title: Murder
302.description: Causing death of a person with intent.

304.title: Culpable Homicide Not Amounting to Murder
304.description: Causing death without intention to kill.
304.punishment: Up to 10 years imprisonment or fine

307.title: Attempt to Murder
307.description: Attempting to cause death by doing an act.
307.punishment: Up to 10 years imprisonment or life imprisonment

323.title: Voluntarily Causing Hurt
323.description: Causing bodily pain or disease to someone.
323.punishment: Up to 1 year imprisonment or fine

324.title: Causing Hurt by Dangerous Weapons
324.description: Hurt caused using weapons like knife, gun, etc.

325.title: Voluntarily Causing Grievous Hurt
325.description: Causing serious bodily harm to another person.

326.title: Causing Grievous Hurt with Dangerous Weapons
326.punishment: Up to life imprisonment or 10 years imprisonment

354.title: Assault on Woman
354.description: Assault or criminal force to outrage modesty of a woman.

354A.title: Sexual Harassment
354A.description: Physical contact, unwelcome sexual advances, or harassment.

354B.title: Assault with Intent to Disrobe
354B.description: Assaulting woman with intent to disrobe.

354C.title: Voyeurism
354C.description: Watching or capturing images of women without consent.

354D.title: Stalking
354D.description: Repeated following or contact against the will of a woman.

363.title: Kidnapping
363.description: Taking away a minor or person against their will.

366.title: Kidnapping/Abducting Woman for Marriage
366.description: Kidnapping a woman to compel her marriage.

379.title: Theft
379.description: Dishonestly taking property out of someoneâ€™s possession.
379.punishment: Up to 3 years imprisonment or fine

380.title: Theft in Dwelling House
380.description: Theft committed in a house, tent, or vessel.

395.title: Dacoity
395.description: Robbery committed by 5 or more persons.

409.title: Criminal Breach of Trust by Public Servant
409.description: Breach of trust by banker, merchant, agent, or public servant.

415.title: Cheating
415.description: Deceiving a person fraudulently to deliver property.
415.punishment: Up to 1 year imprisonment or fine

420.title: Cheating and Dishonest Delivery of Property
420.description: Cheating and dishonestly inducing delivery of property.

468.title: Forgery for Cheating
468.description: Forgery committed with intent to cheat.

471.title: Using Forged Document
471.description: Using a forged document as genuine.
471.punishment: Up to 2 years imprisonment or fine

498A.title: Cruelty by Husband/Relatives
498A.description: Cruelty by husband or his relatives towards woman.

504.title: Intentional Insult
504.description: Intentional insult with intent to provoke breach of peace.

506.title: Criminal Intimidation
506.description: Threatening another with injury to person or property.

509.title: Word/Gesture Insulting Woman
509.description: Insulting modesty of woman by words, sounds or gestures.
